channel.title: personal on Parsecs Reach
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Parsecs Reach

item.title: Announcing a new me
item.description: Hi. My name is Emily. No I’ve not taken over this blog for the day. I’m still the same author but a while ago I came to realize I’m a woman so my old name didn’t fit any more. Don’t panic I’m still doing mostly the same things as before. Just with less background noise in my head so things are a lot better. Family, friends, and colleagues reading this Waves.
